author: cnbc.com
title: SSF Expands Partner Group, Promoting Suki Mann and Brandon Scripps
text:
PLEASANTON, Calif.--(BUSINESS WIRE)-- Sensiba San Filippo LLP (SSF), a leading Northern California-based CPA and business-consulting firm, is proud to announce the promotion of Suki Mann and Brandon Scripps to Partner effective May 1, 2018.
Ms. Mann joined SSF in 2006 as an associate and grew her career within Sensiba San Filippo. She is based in the Firm’s Pleasanton office and leads the Firm’s Employee Benefit Plan Audit practice. She also works extensively with the Firm’s venture-backed technology clients on matters pertaining to revenue recognition and other industry-specific needs. Ms. Mann received her Accounting degree from California State University, Chico, and was a recipient of the YWCA Tribute to Women Awards in 2016.
Mr. Scripps joined SSF in 2006 as an associate and also grew his career within Sensiba San Filippo. He is based in the Firm’s San Jose office and is the leader of the Firm’s Wine and Craft Brew practice. He specializes in financial reporting for manufacturing, distribution, agriculture, and construction companies. Mr. Scripps also received his Accounting degree from California State University, Chico.
“Suki and Brandon have made meaningful contributions to the Firm, both professionally and culturally,” said John Sensiba, Managing Partner of Sensiba San Filippo. “Both Suki and Brandon have demonstrated exemplary client service and leadership skills. Their dedication, commitment and excellence in the profession has made them ideal candidates for equity partnership in our firm. I am honored to have them as a part of the Partner group, and I look forward to watching them take this next step in their career.”
About Sensiba San Filippo
With 40 years of experience, Sensiba San Filippo LLP (SSF) ranks among the region’s top 20 public accounting firms. Offering comprehensive assurance, tax and consulting services, the Firm has a regional focus with global expertise. As a member of Morison KSI, SSF is a part of an international association of affiliated accounting firms that supports their clients’ global business needs in over 88 countries. Headquartered in Pleasanton, the Firm has offices in San Mateo, San Jose, Morgan Hill, Fresno and San Francisco. For more information, visit www.ssfllp.com .
